content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Do you think that Elon Musk will take SpaceX public anytime soon? seems like a good investment given that they are the leader in a possible new industry - space tourism?2 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 03 Mar 2019Highly doubt this. Private equity is big now all over the world. Less scrutiny and more freedom to operate.Looking at what happened with him and TESLA, it is highly unlikely he would want to consider the public route with another baby of his! Just some two cents0 comments1

Leonard TanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Mar 2019Have to agree with Kenneth on this! In fact Elon was unhappy with constantly having to pacify shareholders which was why he tweeted about taking TSLA private. Sadly for him delisting is an extremely complicated process. Moreover, SpaceX doesn’t suffer from a lack of private investors who believe and want to support Elon’s Mission of inhabiting Mars. It would be even harder to manage shareholders given SpaceX non cash flow generating operations.0 comments0
